name: AMWorkflowControllerDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods that a delegate of a workflow controller implements.

items.name: func workflowController(AMWorkflowController, willRun: AMAction)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the specified action is about to run.

items.name: func workflowControllerWillRun(AMWorkflowController)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the workflow controller object is about to run.

items.name: func workflowController(AMWorkflowController, didRun: AMAction)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the specified action finishes running.

items.name: func workflowControllerDidRun(AMWorkflowController)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the workflow controller object finishes running.

items.name: func workflowControllerWillStop(AMWorkflowController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the workflow controller object is about to stop.

items.name: func workflowControllerDidStop(AMWorkflowController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the workflow controller object has stopped.

items.name: func workflowController(AMWorkflowController, didError: Error)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when the workflow encounters an error.
